DOC.brief_summary: The VENTOLIN Mini-Spacer develop order support patient Emerging Markets Asia Pacific region access affordable spacers . The aim exploratory study investigate whether systemic exposure fluticasone propionate ( FP ) salmeterol observe VENTOLIN Mini-Spacer comparable systemic exposure FP salmeterol observe Trudell Aerochamber Plus spacer FLIXOTIDE SERETIDE Metered Dose Inhaler ( MDI ) product . There four study period study participant receive four study treatment study . The total duration study include screening , treatment period , washout period , follow-up period 58 day . Study plan enroll 20 healthy subject . VENTOLIN register trademark GlaxoSmithKline . FLIXOTIDE register trademark GlaxoSmithKline . SERETIDE register trademark GlaxoSmithKline .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Systemic Exposure FLIXOTIDE™ ( Fluticasone Propionate ) SERETIDE™ ( Fluticasone Propionate Salmeterol ) Given With VENTOLIN™ Mini-Spacer Compared Aerochamber Plus Spacer
